components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Messages not Retrievable via the Messaging Logs API or Visible in the Messaging Console

incident_updates.body: Our Engineers are continuing to investigate this incident and are aiming to update the affected records with the latest data. We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console
DEVELOPER TOOLS - REST API

incident_updates.body:
Some messages created between 05:00-05:10 and 05:30-05:40 UTC on Oct 28 which were not retrievable via the Messaging Logs API and the Messaging Console are now accessible, but may still contain partial metadata. We will continue investigating and aim to update the affected records with the latest data.
Update for: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/qjwj2yvjzfh0

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console
DEVELOPER TOOLS - REST API

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 November 2025 at 14:30 PST until 09 November 2025 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 10 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
12 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 12 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
17 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 17 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
24 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 24 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
26 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned maintenance in US & Canada between 19:00 and 20:00 Pacific Time on 11/18/2025. During the maintenance window, LOA (Letters of Authorization) will be delayed. We recommend users not to create or update hosted and ported numbers in that window, but if they do, they can retry if they experience any errors.
